short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows how many days until Trump's inauguration

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Curious how long until Trump takes on the job of president for the second time? Whether you're counting down in excitement or disappointment, use this handy extension to quickly check, with the ability to toggle between days, hours and minutes left until Trump's inauguration.
